text: I Spit on Your Grave 2 is a 2013 American crime horror movie. It is a sequel to I Spit on Your Grave The movie is about a student named Katie who gets kidnapped from New York City. She is taken to Bulgaria for her abductors to rape her. She later gets revenge by tormenting her kidnappers. Most critics didn't like I Spit on Your Grave 2. In 2015, a sequel, I Spit on Your Grave III: Vengeance is Mine, was released. title: I Spit on Your Grave 2
